recipes.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
steps: Season chicken breast with salt, pepper, and herbs.
Grill chicken for 6-7 minutes on each side until cooked through.
Let chicken rest for 5 minutes, then slice.
Combine greens, tomatoes, and cucumber in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
steps: Wash and cut all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat sesame oil in a wok or large pan.
Add garlic and ginger, stir for 30 seconds.
Add softer vegetables and soy sauce.
Cook for 2 more minutes and serve hot.

recipes.name: Zucchini Noodles with Turkey
steps: Cook ground turkey in a pan with garlic.
Top with turkey sauce and serve.

recipes.name: Cauliflower Rice Bowl
steps: Pulse cauliflower in food processor until rice-like.
Add cauliflower rice and cook for 5 minutes.
Mix in chicken and soy sauce.

recipes.name: Greek Yogurt Chicken
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Slice chicken and serve with salad.

recipes.name: Tuna Lettuce Wraps
steps: Mix tuna with yogurt and mustard.
Dice celery and add to mix.

recipes.name: Egg White Frittata
steps: Whisk egg whites and pour over vegetables.

recipes.name: Spicy Shrimp Bowl
steps: Grill shrimp for 3 minutes per side.
Top with shrimp and lime juice.

recipes.name: Turkey Meatballs
steps: Mix turkey, flour, egg, and spices.

recipes.name: Cod with Green Beans
steps: Season cod with herbs and lemon.

recipes.name: Chicken Lettuce Tacos
steps: Cook ground chicken with taco spices.

recipes.name: Chicken Veggie Soup
steps: Add broth and bring to boil.

recipes.name: Turkey Zucchini Boats
steps: Halve zucchini and scoop out centers.
Cook turkey with onion and herbs.

recipes.name: Grilled Tuna Steak
steps: Marinate tuna in soy sauce and ginger.

recipes.name: Egg Drop Soup
steps: Slowly pour eggs into boiling broth.

recipes.name: Herb-Crusted Pork
steps: Coat pork with mustard and herbs.
Slice pork and serve with beans.

recipes.name: Balsamic Chicken
steps: Slice chicken and serve over vegetables.

recipes.name: Quinoa Buddha Bowl
steps: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Arrange quinoa as base in a bowl.
Top with spinach, tomatoes, and chickpeas.
Mix tahini with lemon juice and drizzle over bowl.

recipes.name: Grilled Trout
steps: Season trout with dill and lemon.

recipes.name: Lemon Herb Chicken
steps: Marinate chicken in lemon and herbs.

recipes.name: Vegetable Curry
steps: Add spinach and cook until wilted.

recipes.name: Almond-Crusted Chicken
steps: Coat chicken in egg white then almonds.

recipes.name: Herb Grilled Mackerel
steps: Make salad with arugula and cucumber.

recipes.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
steps: Cut tops off peppers and remove seeds.

recipes.name: Eggplant Parmesan
steps: Slice eggplant and brush with oil.

recipes.name: Lemon Dill Fish
steps: Season fish with dill and lemon.

recipes.name: Chicken Vegetable Stir-Fry
steps: Stir-fry chicken with ginger and garlic.

recipes.name: Protein Packed Omelette
steps: Beat eggs and egg whites in a bowl.
Heat butter in a pan over medium heat.
Pour egg mixture into the pan.
Fold omelette in half and cook until set.

recipes.name: Chicken and Sweet Potato
steps: Cube sweet potato and toss with olive oil.
Place sweet potato on baking sheet.
Serve chicken with sweet potato and broccoli.

recipes.name: Salmon with Brown Rice
steps: Season salmon with dill and lemon.
Serve salmon over rice with asparagus.

recipes.name: Greek Yogurt Chicken Bowl
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and herbs.

recipes.name: Chicken and Chickpea Curry
steps: Add curry powder and cook 1 minute.

recipes.name: Grilled Steak with Potatoes
steps: Season steak with salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Salmon Burger with Sweet Potato Fries
steps: Cube sweet potato and bake as fries.
Flake salmon and mix with egg and breadcrumbs.

recipes.name: Tuna Casserole
steps: Mix tuna, pasta, peas, and yogurt.

recipes.name: Chicken and Rice Bowl
steps: Drizzle with soy sauce and sesame seeds.

recipes.name: Protein Pancakes
steps: Blend oats, protein powder, eggs, and banana.
Top with Greek yogurt and berries.

recipes.name: Meatball Sub
steps: Mix beef with herbs and form meatballs.
Toast in oven until cheese melts.

recipes.name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
steps: Top with chicken, cheese, and onion.

recipes.name: Grilled Salmon with Quinoa
steps: Season salmon with lemon and herbs.
Grill salmon for 5 minutes per side.
Serve salmon over quinoa and spinach.

recipes.name: Chicken and Sweet Potato Hash
steps: Add sweet potato and cook until tender.

recipes.name: Tuna Poke Bowl
steps: Marinate in soy sauce for 5 minutes.
Top with tuna, avocado, edamame, and cucumber.

recipes.name: Chicken Fajita Bowl
steps: Slice chicken and season with fajita spices.
Top with chicken, vegetables, and beans.

recipes.name: Shrimp and Avocado Pasta
steps: Blend avocado with olive oil for sauce.

recipes.name: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry
steps: Stir-fry beef with garlic and ginger.

recipes.name: Turkey Meatball Sub
steps: Mix turkey with herbs and form meatballs.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken Caesar Salad
steps: Slice chicken and add to salad.

recipes.name: Salmon and Sweet Potato
steps: Bake sweet potato at 400°F for 25 minutes.
Season salmon with dill and lemon.

recipes.name: Chicken Burrito Bowl
steps: Top with chicken, beans, and corn.

recipes.name: Tuna Nicoise Salad
steps: Drizzle with olive oil and lemon.

recipes.name: Greek Yogurt Parfait Bowl
steps: Top with almonds and chia seeds.

recipes.name: Chicken and Vegetable Kebabs
steps: Brush with olive oil and lemon.

recipes.name: Turkey and Quinoa Chili
steps: Add tomatoes, beans, quinoa, and spices.
Serve hot with whole grain bread.

recipes.name: Baked Cod with Vegetables
steps: Arrange cod and vegetables on sheet.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon.

recipes.name: Chicken Souvlaki Plate
steps: Marinate chicken in Greek spices and lemon.
Make tzatziki with yogurt and cucumber.
Serve chicken over rice with vegetables.

recipes.name: Shrimp and Quinoa Bowl
steps: Top with shrimp, avocado, tomatoes, and spinach.

recipes.name: Chicken and Brown Rice Casserole
steps: Mix chicken, rice, broccoli, yogurt, and broth.

recipes.name: Turkey and Avocado Bowl
steps: Arrange rice and greens in bowl.
Top with turkey, avocado, and tomatoes.

recipes.name: Avocado Toast
steps: Toast bread slices until golden brown.
Mash avocado with salt and pepper.
Fry or poach eggs to your preference.

recipes.name: Mediterranean Pasta
steps: Cook pasta according to package directions.
Heat olive oil in a pan.
Add minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute.
Cook for 3-4 minutes until tomatoes soften.
Drain pasta and add to pan.
Toss with olives and torn basil.
Top with crumbled feta and pine nuts.

recipes.name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
steps: Add lettuce, chicken, parmesan, and croutons.
Roll tightly and cut in half.

recipes.name: Veggie Burger with Sweet Potato Fries
steps: Cook veggie patty according to package.

recipes.name: Chicken Stir-Fry
steps: Stir-fry chicken with ginger and garlic.

recipes.name: Caprese Salad with Grilled Chicken
steps: Slice chicken and add to plate.
Drizzle with balsamic and olive oil.

recipes.name: Salmon Poke Bowl
steps: Marinate in soy sauce for 5 minutes.

recipes.name: Turkey Club Sandwich
steps: Layer turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and avocado.

recipes.name: Chicken Quesadilla
steps: Cook until golden and cheese melts.
Serve with salsa and sour cream.

recipes.name: Beef Taco Salad
steps: Top with beef, beans, corn, tomatoes.

recipes.name: Vegetable Fried Rice
steps: Stir-fry vegetables with garlic and ginger.

recipes.name: Greek Salad with Grilled Chicken
steps: Dress with olive oil and lemon.

recipes.name: BLT Sandwich
steps: Layer bacon, lettuce, tomato, and avocado.

recipes.name: Tuna Melt
steps: Mix tuna, mayo, celery, and onion.

recipes.name: Chicken Noodle Soup
steps: Add broth and bring to boil.

recipes.name: Grilled Cheese and Tomato Soup
steps: Grill until golden and cheese melts.

recipes.name: Chicken Fajitas
steps: Top with sour cream and salsa.
